Field Detail

lots

public Graph lots
The "lots" graph containing every lot seeds as nodes. Its edges represent the neighborhood relationships between adjacent lots.

width

public int width

lotCoords

public java.util.List<Coordinate> lotCoords

roads

public Graph roads
The "roads" graph containing every constructible routes based on the edges of the Voronoi diagram. Its nodes are possible crossroads.

pivots

public java.util.Map<Node,CrossroadPivot> pivots
A pivot is used to associate a lot with the surrounding crossroads and, conversely, a crossroad with the surrounding lots.

strategies

public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Strategy> strategies
Strategies are processes that are applied to the city at each iteration of the simulation. They are rules describing its evolution.

showPotentialLots

public boolean showPotentialLots
Display options. `showPotentialLots` enables the drawing of lots that have not been built yet. `showWhichVectorField` is the index of the displayed vector field. If its value is -1, no fields are displayed.

showWhichVectorField

public int showWhichVectorField
